full_description:
Marsriva KP1 EC 18W 8000mAh Mini DC UPS

The Marsriva KP1 EC 18W 8000mAh Mini DC UPS is a compact and efficient power solution designed to keep your devices running smoothly even during power outages. Featuring an impressive 8000mAh high-capacity battery, this mini DC UPS provides extended backup time, ensuring uninterrupted operation of your critical devices when mains power is unavailable. Whether you're at home, in the office, or on the go, the KP1 Series delivers reliable power backup whenever you need it. The KP1 Series, which has one USB connector and four DC output connections, is perfect for a variety of applications, including networking equipment, security cameras, routers, modems, and more. It can power several devices at once. The KP1 Series guarantees a smooth transition between mains power and battery backup, keeping your gadgets operational even during energy ON/OFF shifting, thanks to its sophisticated AC to DC 0ms transfer technology. With this function, you can rest easy knowing that your gadgets will always have power. Wall-mount slots on the rear of the KP1 Series, which enable simple installation on any wall surface, are a feature that adds to its ease and adaptability. The UPS's space-saving and compact design maximizes deployment flexibility by enabling it to be easily positioned wherever it is needed. Honeycomb ventilation, which allows for optimal heat dissipation and ensures continuous long-term stability and dependability of the device, is incorporated into the KP1 Series. Because of its effective cooling system, the UPS may function at its best under a variety of circumstances by preventing overheating. Because safety comes first, the KP1 Series is built with a V-0 flame-retardant casing to give you and your belongings the best possible protection. This guarantees increased security and comfort, especially in settings where electrical risks might be an issue. With its high-capacity battery backup, flexible connectivity options, seamless power transfer technology, easy installation, effective heat dissipation, and exceptional safety features, the Marsriva KP1 EC 18W 8000mAh Mini UPS is an invaluable solution for guaranteeing a constant power supply for your vital devices.

full_description:
MARSRIVA KP2 10000mAh Smart Mini DC UPS for Router

The MARSRIVA KP2 is a 10000mAh Smart Mini DC UPS for WiFi routers. It comes with 10000mAh high-capacity battery that supports your devices working longer hours when the electricity supply is cut off. The Mini UPS features AC to DC 0ms transfer technology to keep your devices stay working when electricity is On/Off shifting. It has an input voltage of 100~240VAC / 50-60Hz. It offers 1x PoE, 1x DC, and 1x USB outputs that support powering up 3+ devices. It delivers PoE output of 24V / 0.5A (+4,5pins; -7, 8pins), DC output of 5V / 9V / 12V (Selectable) / 1.5A and USB power output of 5V / 2.4A. It supports 5V/9V/12V DC and 15V/24V PoE, compatible with most digital devices. The MARSRIVA KP2 10000mAh Smart Mini DC UPS has great build quality. The interior components of KP2 are protected by a high-quality metal casing to ensure a long product life. It features honeycomb ventilation for evenly distributing operational heat faster. It ensures long-term stability. It has been designed conveniently with wall-mount slots on the back. The MARSRIVA KP2 features 6KV lightning protection ensuring all-weather suitability. The MARSRIVA KP2 comes with 6 months of warranty.

full_description:
Marsriva KP2 Ultra 30W 16000mAh Mini DC UPS

The Marsriva KP2 Ultra 30W Mini DC UPS is a clever and small gadget that can keep your electronics operating when the power goes out. It features four output ports that can power up several gadgets at the same time. It contains one passive PoE port that may deliver power and data to PoE-enabled devices such as IP cameras, access points, and so on. It features two DC ports for connecting to routers, modems, switches, and so on. Marsriva KP2 Ultra 30W 16000mAh Mini DC UPS contains a single USB port for charging mobile phones, tablets, and other devices. The KP2 Ultra 30W Mini DC UPS uses rapid and flawless AC to DC transfer technology to seamlessly transition between power sources. It may safeguard your electronics against voltage fluctuations, surges, and spikes, among other things. It contains a large 16000 mAh battery that may give more backup time for your gadgets. It offers a 30W high-power output that can improve compatibility with many devices. The elegant and durable build of the KP2 Ultra 30W Mini DC UPS allows it to fit in any location. It includes wall-mount slots on the rear that allow you to quickly mount it to the wall. Marsriva KP2 Ultra 30W 16000mAh Mini DC UPS incorporates an air cooling system that allows for optimum heat dissipation and ensures the UPS's long-term stability. It features a V-0 flame retardant product housing that can protect you and your property from any fire threats.
